summary.span: Provides a base class for the design-time functionality of a Web Forms page and allows access to and manipulation of components and controls that are contained within the Web Forms page at design time.

span.span: Provides a base class for the design-time functionality of a Web Forms page and allows access to and manipulation of components and controls that are contained within the Web Forms page at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计宿主，如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，必须提供其自己的派生的版本向控件设计器通过类设计器的属性。A design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], must provide its own derived version of the class to control designers through the property of the designer. 控制设计器使用属性进行访问和在设计时操作包含的 Web 窗体页。Control designers use the property to access and manipulate the containing Web Forms page at design time.

span.para: 继承自类，必须重写以下成员:- ， ， ， ， ，和属性。 - ， ， ， ，和方法。
When you inherit from the class, you must override the following members: - The , , , , , and properties. - The , , , , and methods.

summary.span: When overridden in a derived class, adds a Web server control to the Web Forms page.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, adds a Web server control to the Web Forms page.

returns.span: The ID of the control that was added.

span.span: The ID of the control that was added.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已存在一个控件具有相同 ID 的 Web 窗体页中，控件可能已分配给它的 ID，尽管分配一个新的 ID。Although a control might already have an ID assigned to it, if there is already a control in the Web Forms page with the same ID, a new ID is assigned.

value.span: 一个数组对象在设计器中受支持; 否则为，如果该组件没有谓词。

span.span: An array of objects supported by the designer; otherwise, , if the component has no verbs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 通常情况下，设计时环境提供**属性**组件在快捷菜单命令。Typically, a design-time environment provides a **Properties** command on a shortcut menu for a component. 因此，不包括一个类似的条目中的设计器指定谓词的集合。Therefore, do not include a similar entry in the collection of designer-specified verbs.
